price: Afutuo bεn bio, wͻ ԑberε a Ɔsomafoͻ aba wͻn hͻ rekyerεkyerε biribiara mu pefee,
arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: annā lahumu al-dhik'rā waqad jāahum rasūlun mubīnun
